help: File containing the data over the surface
Base name for the output files
Maximum number of jobs to be used. If abscent,onejobperCPU will be spawned
Laplacian normalization to be used. Possibilities are "geig", "unnorm", "rw" and "sym". Defaults to geig
Calculate full brain feature gradient analyses
File containing the labels to identify the cortex, rather than the medial brain structures. This flag must be set for normal analyses and full brain analyses
File containing the surface clusters. Cluster with index 0 are expected to denote the medial brain structures and will be ignored
